divs: sighting detailssharp turns ... high speeds .. possibliy 1500 mph, maybe within 30 miles away from our perspective....6 possible witnesses...4 defenitely... no explanation on record. friday, memorial day weekend of 1997...from 10:50 p.m. till 1:20a.m sat morning over dallas, tx.... for 2.5 hours we watched them play... then again on the following sunday for about 1 1\2 hours. no other reports...were made . nor heard of. wish to find other witnesses.. thank you.
